content: every year we start the christmas season with making a wreath out of wonderfully fragrant fir branches we decorate it with a red bow and hang it on our door this cute mini wreath is the crochet version of our pretty christmas decoration make gift tags with it use it for fairy doors or doll houses in a 1 12 scale **skill-level easy** * right handed tutorial us terms * basics working in rounds * crochet stitches slip knot slip_stitch chain stitch single_crochet stitch **tools and materials** use any yarn you like and a smaller hook size than recommended for the tutorial i used cotton yarn schachenmayr catania color 00412 moss and 00192 bordeaux and myboshi no 2 color cactus and tomato with a sequin yarn you need a tiny amount of yarn so you can use yarn scraps you ll also want to have a crochet hook 2 5 mm scissors and glue you could weave in the ends though the mini wreath will measure about 1 in 2 5 - 3 cm in diameter **happy christmas crafting **
